channel.title: Whiteaugusttea.com on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Whiteaugusttea.com on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: day #2
item.description: it’s not so much that i was craving tea. often my cravings force me into a no-nonsense beeline, and, since this was more of a leisurely sunday drive on a friday afternoon, all signs point to no craving. no, what i was after was more the process than the result. so i embarked on a mini-adventure up the 51, next to the mountains that pop up & appear to swallow cars at shea, heading toward the artsy pedestrian bridges south of greenway.
